TourismPage.hero_subtitle: Rest, recover, and rediscover yourself in the heart of Bangkok.

rakxa.title: RAKxa Integrative Wellness
rakxa.description: An integrative medical wellness retreat located in Bang Krachao (Bangkok's green lung). Personalized programs combining cutting-edge medical diagnostics with traditional healing.

sindhorn.title: Sindhorn Wellness by Resense
sindhorn.description: The ultimate wellness sanctuary in the heart of Bangkok. Featuring hydrotherapy and thermal journeys for a luxurious urban retreat.

greenroom.title: The Green Room Yoga Studio
greenroom.description: Bangkok's premier boutique yoga studio in Sukhumvit 31. Over 80 weekly classes including yoga, Pilates, and sound baths.

footer.tagline2: Optimizing your Human OS through data-driven wellness experiences.

ExplorePage.title: Explore Experiences
ExplorePage.subtitle: Curated sanctuaries in Bangkok.
ExplorePage.popular_subtitle: Trending styles of healing in Bangkok
ExplorePage.search_cta_desc: Search for the perfect wellness experience by area, goal, and budget.

holistic.title: Loft Thai Boutique Spa & Massage
holistic.desc: Time Out 'Best Spa in Bangkok 2025'. Fusion of traditional Thai massage and modern luxury. Famous for Thai Warrior Massage and CBD oil therapy.

medical.title: Divana Divine Spa
medical.desc: World Spa Awards nominee. Thai-born premium spa brand. Exquisite healing with signature herbal treatments in a luxurious setting.

active.title: Absolute You Wellness
active.desc: Bangkok's hot yoga leader. Dynamic movements and diverse class categories to activate mind and body. All levels welcome.

EventsPage.title: Events
EventsPage.subtitle: Workshops and gatherings for your well-being.

yoga_park.title: Sunrise Yoga @ Lumpini Park
yoga_park.desc: Free public yoga held every morning. Start your day surrounded by lush greenery and fresh air. Beginners welcome.

sound_bath.title: Sound Healing @ Akasha Wellness
sound_bath.desc: Held at Akasha Wellness on Charoen Nakhon (Riverside). Deep relaxation through the vibrations of gongs, Tibetan bowls, and crystal bowls.

nutrition.title: Raw Food & Detox @ Rasayana Retreat
nutrition.desc: Learn about enzyme-rich raw food diets at Rasayana Retreat in Phrom Phong. Experience detox from the inside out.

ShopPage.title: Shop
ShopPage.subtitle: Curated items for your wellness lifestyle.

herbal_ball.title: Organic Herbal Ball
herbal_ball.desc: Thai traditional wisdom. Warm up and press to improve circulation.

sleep_mist.title: Deep Sleep Mist
sleep_mist.desc: Lavender and Sandalwood scent to guide you into deep sleep.

singing_bowl.title: Handmade Singing Bowl
singing_bowl.desc: Handcrafted by artisans in Nepal, producing healing tones.

yoga_mat.title: Natural Rubber Yoga Mat
yoga_mat.desc: Non-slip and sustainable material, kind to the earth.

bkk_guide.title: Bangkok Wellness Guide 2026
bkk_guide.desc: Must-visit spots from city centers to hidden retreats. Perfect for beginners.

meditation_101.title: Intro to Vipassana Meditation
meditation_101.desc: What is 'Insight' meditation? A mindfulness guide for busy modern people.

thai_massage.title: Hidden Benefits of Thai Massage
thai_massage.desc: More than just a massage. Exploring the secrets of 'Lazy Man's Yoga'.

intro.title: AI Engineering Scanner (Beta)
intro.subtitle: Visualizing your 'Brain Fatigue (CPU)' and 'Physical Vitality (Battery)'.
intro.bubble: Welcome to the Human OS Dashboard. We will scan your current system state (mind-body condition) and propose optimal maintenance methods.

questions.consent: Before starting: This diagnosis is not a medical procedure. Please consult a doctor if you are not feeling well.
questions.phq_1: Past 2 weeks: Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge?
questions.phq_2: Past 2 weeks: Not being able to stop or control worrying?
questions.phq_3: Past 2 weeks: Little interest or pleasure in doing things?
questions.phq_4: Past 2 weeks: Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless?
questions.who_1: Past 2 weeks: I have felt cheerful and in good spirits
questions.who_2: Past 2 weeks: I have felt calm and relaxed
questions.who_3: Past 2 weeks: I have felt active and vigorous
questions.who_4: Past 2 weeks: I woke up feeling fresh and rested
questions.who_5: Past 2 weeks: My daily life has been filled with things that interest me
questions.sleep_1: Sleep: Do you have trouble falling asleep?
questions.sleep_2: Do you wake up during the night or early morning?
questions.sleep_3: Do you feel refreshed when you wake up in the morning? (Reverse score)
questions.sleep_4: Do you feel sleepy or lack concentration during the day?
questions.pss_1: Past month: Have you been upset because of something that happened unexpectedly?
questions.pss_2: Past month: Have you felt confident about your ability to handle your personal problems?
questions.pss_3: Past month: Have you felt that things were not going your way?
questions.pss_4: Past month: Have you felt difficulties were piling up so high that you could not overcome them?
questions.act_1: Activity: How many days/week do you do vigorous physical activity?
questions.act_2: Activity: How many days/week do you do moderate physical activity?
questions.act_3: Activity: How many days/week do you walk for at least 30 minutes?

options.some_time: Some of the time (1 day/week or less)

results.title: Your Wellness Prescription
results.summary_intro: Thanks for checking in. Analysis shows your most needed theme is **{theme}**.
results.summary_sleep: Sleep quality is significantly lowered, likely the root cause of daytime performance issues. It is time to prioritize 'Rest' technology over activity.
results.summary_mental: Mental energy is depleting. You may be carrying too much responsibility. Prioritize 'Doing Nothing' to calm your nervous system.
results.summary_stress: Your mind and body are in a 'Fight or Flight' state due to pressure. Release accumulation through physical movement to avoid chronic fatigue.
results.summary_active: Data suggests a lack of physical activity. Reduced movement correlates with stagnation and fatigue. Light aerobic exercise is your best medicine.
results.summary_balance: Excellent state! Your mind-body balance is well maintained. Try new wellness experiences to further nurture self-affirmation.

observations.obs_sleep_poor: Sleep quality issues detected; recovery is not catching up.
observations.obs_mental_strain: Mood swings and mental fatigue accumulation detected.
observations.obs_high_stress: Near stress tolerance limit; tension is not releasing.
observations.obs_sedentary: Lack of movement or sedentary lifestyle detected.
observations.obs_good_state: Overall high vitality and good rhythm.

results.warning_phq: Signs of depressed mood detected. Please consider consulting a specialist if it persists.
results.warning_sleep: Significant sleep disruption detected. Doctor consultation recommended if it continues.
results.disclaimer: *This diagnosis is not medical practice. Consult a doctor if you feel unwell.

items.a01_desc: Breathing technique to reset the nervous system.
items.a02_desc: Turn off phones 1 hour before bed.
items.a03_desc: Reset body clock with 15 mins of sunlight.
items.e01_desc: Contrast bath therapy in Bangkok to balance autonomic nerves.
items.e02_desc: Enjoy organic lunch and sweets in a glass house overflowing with greenery.
items.e03_desc: Authentic Muay Thai workout for all levels, connected to Asoke Station.
items.w01_desc: A day in Bang Kachao forest.
items.w02_desc: Deep relaxation guided by the overtones of Tibetan bowls and gongs.
items.p01_desc: Ring-type device to visualize sleep and recovery.
items.p05_desc: Deepen focus and rest with silence.

cooldown.title: System Stabilization Period
cooldown.desc: To ensure accurate diagnosis, a {days}-day standby period is required until the next scan. Please focus on your recovery program for now.

optimal.title: Peak Performance
optimal.desc: All systems optimized. Ready for high-load tasks.

brain_fog.title: Brain Fog (Overload)
brain_fog.desc: Processing load increased. Cognitive function may be reduced.

low_battery.title: Physical Fatigue (Depleted)
low_battery.desc: Body energy is low. Thinking is clear, but conserve physical output.

high_stress.title: Mental Instability
high_stress.desc: Mental load is high. Mandatory shutdown (rest) required.

balanced_fatigue.title: General Drain
balanced_fatigue.desc: Resources low across the board. Operate in Low Power Mode.

critical.title: Emergency Stop Recommended
critical.desc: System limits reached. Stop all activity immediately and recover.

digital_overload.title: Digital Overload
digital_overload.desc: Digital eye strain detected. Visual overload slowing processing speed.

physical_tension.title: Physical Tension
physical_tension.desc: Muscle hyper-tension. Sympathetic nervous system overactive.

deep_exhaustion.title: Deep Exhaustion
deep_exhaustion.desc: Accumulated deep fatigue. Surface rest won't help; deep sleep needed.

scattered_mind.title: Scattered Mind
scattered_mind.desc: Attention scattered. Multitasking has fragmented brain memory.
